definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the practices and institutions that privilege or value heterosexuality, heterosexual relationships, and traditional gender roles as fundamental and "natural" within society.
examples: Much of the language used when discussing wedding planning is heteronormative , which can alienate homosexual couples.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the practices and institutions that privilege or value heterosexuality, heterosexual relationships, and traditional gender roles as fundamental and "natural" within society.
